metadata.title: Instant Message - Victorian Skeleton Cameo Lady - Women's Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt
features: YOUR NEW FAVORITE TEE - Our exclusive women's cut t-shirt is soft and lightweight. You'll love the relaxed fit and slightly longer length designed to fit every body from Small to Plus size 4XL. Need something a little more fitted? Size down one size.

SIZE & FIT - We are proud to offer this size-inclusive women's garment. This is a relaxed fit garment with a slightly longer length and fits true to size. For a more tailored fit, size down one size. Our extended, plus sizes (1X-4X) are made especially for a plus size fit. Please use the size chart image for accurate sizing.

CUSTOMER SATISFACTION - We're trusted by customers to deliver high quality products at a great price. If you're not satisfied with your order for any reason, get in touch with us and we'll make it right.
PRINTED & SHIPPED IN THE USA - Make sure it says "Sold by Hybrid Promotions" for authentic product.

Instant Message is an online specialty fashion retailer for everything from funny to inspiring printed apparel. We offer a range of garments from long sleeve and relaxed fit t-shirts, to lightweight french-terry sweatshirts, hoodies and graphic print pullovers. Our products feature fun and trendy graphics that are perfect for any occasion and also make great gifts. Check out our full range of products by searching for Instant Message or clicking the store link above the product title.
description: ABOUT THIS PRODUCT: Instant Message - Victorian Skeleton Cameo Lady - Women's Short Sleeve Graphic T-ShirtInstant Message is an online specialty fashion retailer for everything from funny to inspiring printed apparel. We offer a range of garments from long sleeve and relaxed fit t-shirts, to lightweight french-terry sweatshirts, hoodies and graphic print pullovers. Our products feature fun and trendy graphics that are perfect for any occasion and also make great gifts. Check out our full range of products by searching for Instant Message.OUR METHOD - We print your order on demand at our centrally located printing facility in Columbus, OH, USA. We print using high quality, sustainable, water-based inks that are safe for children and adults alike.CUSTOMER SERVICE - We strive to provide top quality t-shirts, tanks, sweatshirts and more to our customers. If for any reason you are not satisfied with your order, please contact us so we can make it right for you.ABOUT HYBRID APPAREL - Founded in 1997, Hybrid Apparel is the leading full-service design, development, sourcing, production and apparel distribution company based in Cypress, California. Hybrid has a world-class sourcing and global supply chain infrastructure, with expertise in customer delivery and service across a wide range of apparel categories and geographies. As the industry leader in brand and licensing management, Hybrid supports the best global and national brands as well as global licensed properties across media and entertainment, music, gaming, food & beverage, auto, lifestyle and more.
